unnormalised: As per Sec 125 of CrPC, Smt. Sharma is entitled to maintenance of Rs. 10,000 p.m. from Mr. Sharma, effective 01/01/2024. The Hon'ble Court considered Adv. Verma's arguments in the matter.
normalised: As per Section one hundred and twenty five of C-R-P-C, Smt. Sharma is entitled to maintenance of rupee ten thousand per month from Mr. Sharma, effective first January two thousand and twenty four. The Honorable Court considered Advocate Verma's arguments in the matter.
